contentrichtext.text: '''Jabal Ram''' is a mountain in [[Jordan]]. Most authorities give its elevation as {{convert|1734|m|ft|0|abbr=on}} metres above sea level. It was once thought to be the highest point in Jordan, but [[SRTM]] data shows that [[Jabal Umm al Dami]] is {{convert|1854|m|ft|0|abbr=on}}<ref>http://bubl.ac.uk/org/tacit/TAC/tac47/highjink.htm</ref> metres above sea level and therefore higher. ==References== <references/> {{Coord|29.58333|35.40000|display=title}} [[Category:Mountains of Jordan|Ram]] {{Jordan-geo-stub}}
